discourse_list.title: TOR access to rss feeds prompts captcha challenge for this forum via cloudflare

content.content: Please can the admin on here fix or lower the security on cloudflare to be able to successfully pull rss feeds via tor? because at the moment everytime rss feeds are pulled from here, a captcha challenge from cloudflare is constantly requesting to be completed.

Hi @chewie0 , You can achieve this on your Tor setting i think by setting up your Security Level in your parameter. Or you can also set up a Route but i am not sure if the Admin here are allowing. You should send a message to @rich.brown
